text: Lukas Meijer (born 21 August 1988) is a Swedish rock musician, guitarist, singer and songwriter, vocalist of band No Sleep For Lucy. Together with Polish DJ Gromee, he represented Poland at the Eurovision Song Contest 2018 in Lisbon, Portugal, with the song "Light Me Up". ==Biography== He spent his childhood in Ulricehamn. He graduated from high school in Tingsholm and studied at the Uppsala University. In his youth he practiced ice hockey. His brother, Sebastian Meijer, is a professional ice hockey player.
